ch0111_00_wataru/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve been waiting for you.
ch0111_00_wataru/0101_0701_02_10: Ready to go do some exploring today?
ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0701_02_10:
It’s hard to catch them, but it’s so much fun
training them.
ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0701_03_10:
And their strength is out of this world!
They make the best partners!
ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0701_04_10:
However, Dragon-type Pokémon don’t do well in
the cold. It’s not uncommon for me to huddle
with mine in the winter to keep them warm.
ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0702_01_10:
If only there were a heated blanket big enough for
a dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0702_02_10: Maybe even big enough to have a picnic on.
ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0702_03_10:
Ha ha! I can’t even imagine how big that blanket
would have to be.
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of dragon masters in Blackthorn
City, where I’m from.
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_02_10:
My grandfather is the elder of a famous clan of
dragon masters.
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_03_10:
He, his grandfather, and even his grandfather
before him...
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_04_10: they all had a deep bond with dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0702_01_10:
Someday, stories about me will be passed down
to future generations of our clan as well.
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0702_02_10:
If I think about it that way, it reminds me that I
have to be on my best behavior.
ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0702_03_10:
I’d like to be a good role model for all future
dragon masters.
ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0701_01_10:
I can’t stand Trainers that cheat or use cowardly
and underhanded tactics.
ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0701_02_10: Battles should be fought fair and square.
ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0701_03_10:
Whenever you battle, make sure you keep it
clean, too.
ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0702_01_10: Only cowards resort to sucker punches.
ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0702_02_10: Pokémon moves are a different story, though.
ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0702_03_10:
If you have Pokémon that use Sucker Punch or
Feint Attack, more power to you!
ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0701_01_10:
This cape is a defining part of my wardrobe.
I wear it rain or shine.
ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0701_02_10:
Back in my hometown of Blackthorn City, my cape
is like a uniform. When people see it, they know
I’m a dragon master.
ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0701_03_10:
I happen to like it quite a bit. It’s a uniform that
many aspiring dragon masters hope to wear
one day.
ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0702_01_10:
You want to know where I got this cape? It was
actually custom-made at a department store.
ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0702_02_10:
I can’t resist buying more of them whenever I
shop there.
ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0701_01_10:
Whenever I see people or Pokémon in need, I feel
compelled to help them in any way I can.
ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0701_02_10:
One man’s justice may be another
man’s injustice...
ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0701_03_10:
but I can only trust that what I believe is right
and stay steadfast on my path.
ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0702_01_10:
If you ever think what I’m doing is wrong
or unjust, don’t hesitate to stop me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0702_02_10: But I should warn you, I don’t back down easily.
ch0111_00_wataru/1701_0701_01_10:
Ah, I was just thinking of you!
Here, take this with you!
ch0111_00_wataru/1701_0701_02_10: You never know. It might come in handy.
ch0111_00_wataru/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure you’ll use it to help somebody.
ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0701_01_10:
If I’m going to fight in a Pokémon battle, I want
to win.
ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0701_02_10:
Your skills have noticeably increased after each of
your battles.
ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0702_01_10: I see you getting stronger and stronger.
ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0702_02_10:
You have noticeably increased your skills after
each battle.
ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0702_03_10:
I hope to remain a trusted teammate and a
formidable rival to you.
ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m sure you would become almost invincible
if you mastered using dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0701_02_10:
Speaking of dragon Pokémon, that reminds me
of my hometown, Blackthorn City!
ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0701_03_10:
If you’re interested in meeting dragon masters,
I’ll show you around someday.
ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0702_01_10:
If we ever have the chance, I’d like you to show
me around your hometown, too.
ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe the source of your strength lies in
your origins.
ch0111_00_wataru/3001_0701_01_10:
Pleasant morning we’re having today!
The Pokémon are all bright and cheerful.
ch0111_00_wataru/3002_0701_01_10:
I always feel at my best when I have a
nice, hearty breakfast in the morning!
ch0111_00_wataru/3003_0701_01_10:
Don’t let your energy crash in the afternoon.
Wake up! Keep moving!
ch0111_00_wataru/3004_0701_01_10:
It’s good to travel around to new places every
so often. It can be a nice change of pace.
ch0111_00_wataru/3005_0701_01_10:
Make sure you get a good rest tonight.
We could use that energy tomorrow!
ch0111_00_wataru/3006_0701_01_10:
Taking care of my health is one of my highest
priorities. Always has been, always will be.
